New Records: Jalen Green scored 22 of his 29 points in the third quarter
Alperen Sengun added 26 points and 10 rebounds
Amen Thompson scored 20 points and grabbed 15 boards
Houston improved to 6-1 on the road against Eastern Conference opponents
Key Match Events: Rockets extended their lead with a 21-6 third-quarter run
Green scored 11 points and sank three 3-pointers during that stretch
Washington's 18 turnovers led to 35 Houston points
Pre-Game Insights: Washington leading scorer Jordan Poole missed his second straight game with a bruised left hip
fellow starter Kyle Kuzma exited at halftime with a bruised right calf
Rockets: Thompson continues to blossom in his second season
Wizards: A marginally improved 4-10 stretch will be hard to sustain if Poole and Kuzma miss more time
Post-Match Reflections: Upcoming games: Washington visits Philadelphia Wednesday. The Rockets head to Memphis Thursday
The Rockets improved to 6-1 on the road against Eastern Conference opponents
